DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics PF-04191834 respectively give orally single dispersion dose single dose suspension . The suspension test formulation dispersion formulation novel preparation compare .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Of The Pharmacokinetics Of PF-04191834 Following Single Dose Administration Of A Dispersion Formulation And A Suspension Formulation In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject nonchildbearing potential age 18 55 year , inclusive . Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . Clinical evidence exist hepatic disease medical history condition last year . Subjects AST ALT > ULN . Subjects total bilirubin > ULN ( except document history Gilbert 's Syndrome ) . Subjects AST/ALT/total bilirubin > ULN < 1.5X ULN may retested . Treatment investigational drug within 30 day 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) precede first dose study medication ; Use tobacco nicotinecontaining product excess equivalent 5 cigarette per day ; Females childbearing potential . Subjects positive response ( score 1 ) suicidality Sheehan Suicidality Tracking Scale ( SSTS ) ( specifically item 1a , 1b , 3 , 4 , 5 , 6 , 7 , 9 ) .
